p: The values of TPC, TFC, TFOC, total flavanol content (TFAC), total hydrolyzable tannin content (THTC), and total condensed tannin content (TCTC) for different parts of walnut fruit reported in the literature are summarized in Table 2. From the table, it can be easily observed that in most studies, the contents of total phenolics and flavonoids for different parts of walnut fruit have been evaluated. However, comprehensive data regarding the TFOC, TFAC, THTC, and TCTC are rare.
